item.title: Machine Learning using linear regression to predict house prices
item.description: Intro & Background Linear regression being one of the most basic and popular algorithms in machine learning, so when aspiring data scientist starts off in this field, linear regression is inevitably the first algorithm they come across. Analysis Approach You can click on the link below to see the working code in Python and reproduce it to test the strength of your own password. https://github.com/2series/100_Days_of_ML_Code/blob/master/Linear_Regression_from_Scratch.ipynb

item.title: mtcars Data Analysis
item.description: Preamble: This document focuses on the analysis of the mtcars data frame. Descriotion of data frame mtcars can be found at https://stat.ethz.ch/R-manual/R-devel/library/datasets/html/mtcars.html Research questions: is a vehicle with auto or manual transmission better in terms of miles p/gallons(mpg)? quantify the (mpg) difference between auto & manual transmission. Structure of analysis: I will asssess both queries from different perspectives employing a set of methodologies that can be broadly grouped as follows:
